CodeplexIssue.Title: MergeShapes Should Work for Office 2010
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: When Call the method of ShapeRange.MergeShapes, The VSTO works even in Office 2010, and the NetOffice comes error. The Microsoft Office don't support this methos in vba of Office 2010, but supported in VSTO for Office 2010. (The online help is in the vba program. ) Any idea to solve this problem?

CodeplexComment.Author: ye4241
